SELECT S.id, usual_por, usual_sco, mid_por, mid_sco, final_por, final_sco, others, pass, choose_id,C.id AS course_id, C.name AS courseName, start_year, start_sem,RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY C.id ORDER BY AVG(final_sco*final_por*0.01 + mid_sco*mid_por*0.01 + usual_sco*usual_por*0.01) desc) AS 'rank' FROM score_info AS S, choose_course AS CH, course_info AS C WHERE S.choose_id = CH.id AND C.id = CH.course_id GROUP BY S.id
